page.title: 13EVENTS IN PLYMTREE
page.content: During 1985 the following social events took place in Plymtree village (*denotes traditional event): Keep Fit Classes Police Choir Pancake Races* Concert First Aid Classes Kentisbeare Valentine's Dance* Players': Kentisbeare Players': "Busybody" "A Basinful of Briny" Country Dance Scrabble Competition Beetle Drive Cosmic Zoom Day Book Fair Flower Show* Coffee Morning* Disco Carol Singing School Summer Supper* around the Sunday School Autumn village* Bazaar School Concert* Fun Run Children's Harvest Supper* Christmas WI Garden Party & Parties* Tennis Competition Whist Drives* Country Fayre & Gymkhana* Friendly Cricket Match
